verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: his reversal on Chinese company ZTE only relates to a " larger trade deal " his administration seeks with Beijing] .
President Trump says [ARG1: his reversal on Chinese company ZTE] [ARGM-ADV: only] [V: relates] [ARG2: to a " larger trade deal " his administration seeks with Beijing] .
President Trump says his reversal on Chinese company ZTE only relates to [ARG1: a " larger trade deal "] [ARG0: his administration] [V: seeks] [ARGM-PRD: with Beijing] .
